settings.heading: How To Apply
settings.content:
Clean – Use the cotton roll to dry and prep your tooth

Apply – Add a small amount of dental-grade adhesive and place the gem

Cure – Set in place with the mini UV light

custom_css: .steps-title {font-weight: 700; /* make it bold */ font-size: clamp(1.1rem, 2.1vw, 1.6rem); margin: 0 0 12px;}
gs_liquid_gzrLir.name: Custom Liquid

settings.title: Is it safe to apply a tooth gem at home?
settings.answer: Yes — the MoonRock Gems Starter Kit uses certified materials, including dental-grade adhesive, that comply with UK, EU and USA product safety standards. As long as you follow the instructions carefully, it’s a safe and non-invasive cosmetic application.

settings.title: How long do the gems stay on?
settings.answer: With proper application and full UV curing, gems can stay on for up to 2–3 weeks. Results vary depending on factors like placement, oral hygiene, and how much wear your teeth go through.

settings.title: Can I remove the gem myself?
settings.answer: Yes — you can gently remove the gem at home by applying light pressure with a cotton pad or using dental floss to loosen the edges. Any leftover adhesive will gradually wear away over time with regular brushing and flossing.
